name: Patchwork Kingdom #393 | Cinzima
description: Cinzima is a rare instance of an entire kingdom where none of the 234 schools are connected to the internet (and 16 schools with unavailable data as stars in the sky) | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
